unit_rules.name: Dark Zealotry
unit_rules.text: While leading a unit, if the unit contains the Dark Apostle, melee attacks made by models in that unit have +1 to the Wound roll.

unit_rules.name: Demogogue
unit_rules.text: Once per battle, when Activated, select a friendly Battle-Shocked +Heretic Astartes+ unit within 9". That unit is no longer Battle-Shocked.

unit_rules.name: Malign Sacrifice
unit_rules.text: When declaring a Fight target, you may destroy one Dark Disciple model. If you do, roll a d6. One a 2-5, the declared target suffers 1 Mortal Damage. On a 6+, the declared target suffers d3 Mortal Damage instead.
